schema:
You must assume the following PostgreSQL database schema:

Tables:

department
- id (integer)
- name (text)
- location (text)

employee
- id (integer)
- name (text)
- age (integer)
- salary (numeric)
- join_date (date)
- department_id (integer)

chat_history
- id (uuid)
- user_question (text)
- bot_answer (text)
- sql_query (text)
- document_references (jsonb)
- created_at (timestamp with time zone)
- metadata (jsonb)

project
- id (integer)
- name (text)
- department_id (integer)
- start_date (date)
- end_date (date)

sales_table
- id (integer)
- product_name (text)
- quantity_sold (integer)
- unit_price (numeric)

documents
- id (uuid)
- name (character varying)
- url (text)
- created_at (timestamp with time zone)

documentation
- id (uuid)
- name (character varying)
- url (text)
- created_at (timestamp with time zone)
- project_name (character varying)
- meeting_date (date)
- content (text)
- document_type (character varying)

trial_documents
- id (uuid)
- name (character varying)
- url (text)
- created_at (timestamp with time zone)
- project_name (character varying)
- meeting_date (date)
- meeting_time (time without time zone)
- processed_content (text)

customers
- name (character varying)

owners
- name (character varying)
- location (character varying)
